title: [1.7.10][SSP/SMP][Infstudio]【HUD】Show Durability 2  ——一款简洁优美的HUD  3/3
txt_content:
本帖最后由 1137246733 于 2015-10-25 10:39 编辑 
Show Durability 2简单介绍：

Show Durability2 Mod为您提供了一个HUD，显示了真实的武器耐久及其它数据在饥饿栏上。 （可以关闭）
同时你的护甲的耐久性会在快捷栏的左侧或右侧显示（可关闭，可配置）。
耐久性显示颜。 （可配置）
这个mod同时兼容匠魂MOD。



图片欣赏：






（细心的同学会观察出两幅图的不同）


ChangeLog：
（这种东西向来看不懂{:10_492:}）

Changelog:
[url=]Spoiler (click to hide)[/url]
1.3.0   - updated to 1.7.2   - removed key bindings1.2.10   - minor bug fixes1.2.9   - Added Tooltip and compatibility with the new Show Durability 1(forge version)1.2.8   - Added Tinkers Construct support (tell me if i missed something)1.2.7- Refactured the code1.2.6   - Armor HUD is now available with icons of the worn armor   - Addet new options to config file      - armor icons can be turned of and on      - there are two design layouts for the icons version of the armor HUD      - the way durability is displayed is now fully customizable      - empty armor slot text is also fully customizable   - Armor HUD on the left now fits dynamicly1.2.3   - Fixed a bug where keybindings got activated while typing on chat1.2.2   - Updated to 1.6.2   - Addet key bindings to switch side of Armor HUD ingame (default: l = left, graves = right)   - Settings caused by key bindings are saved in config file now   - Changed order of changelog so the most recent change is allways the first1.1.1   - fixed problem with tool HUD while riding a horse1.1.0   - Upadated to 1.6.1 (made a 1.5.2 version too)   - Addet Config file with options:      - Color      - Flicker when critical state         - configurable conditions for flickering      - Armor Durability         - configurable if its on the left or the right side of the hotbar   - you can toggle the Armor Display on and off ingame by pressing F7 (key is configurable in controll settings)1.0.2   - Fixed positioning bug where oxygen-bar was covered   - Adjusted positioning for creative mode1.0.1   - Released for the first time!!!   - Excitement





下载地址：
不需要翻墙：
{:10_492:}



IceSix的屠版进行时 3/3
